questId1.name: Astral Chord
questId1.description: The renowned Astral Chord is here to showcase his fabulous items! He requires 🪙 100x Coins and 💰 50x Gold Coins for his enchanting trade, offering you 💵 2000x Money in return.

questId2.name: Sunroom Siesta
questId2.description: Sunroom Siesta, the inquisitive dreamer, is here to ask you a perplexing question! Rumor has it that there is a secret to acquiring the prestigious Crown Title in this bot. If you help her uncover this mystery, she will reward you with a shimmering 💎 Blue Gem Coin 1x!
questId2.questions: How do I get Crown Title on this bot?

questId3.name: Stellar Symphony
questId3.description: The charismatic Stellar Symphony calls upon you to deliver 📦 10x bucks and 🪙 50x coins. In return for your efforts, you will receive 🎤 2x Megaphones to amplify your voice and spread your influence!

questId4.name: Astral Chord
questId4.description: The fabulous Astral Chord requires your assistance! Bring him 1000x Money, and he will reward you with 30 Super Mystery Boxes filled with surprise treasures!

questId5.name: Stellar Symphony
questId5.description: The Stellar Symphony seeks your aid once more! Deliver 🪙 100x Coins and 💵 1000x Money, and in return, receive a mystical Moonlight to illuminate your path in the dark.

questId6.name: Sunroom Siesta
questId6.description: Sunroom Siesta is eager to learn! Share your wisdom with her by answering her query about the bot's ownership, and she will reward you with 5 Tokens to help you on your journey.
questId6.questions: Who is the owner of this bot?

questId7.name: Youhu
questId7.description: Youhu, the spirited girl, needs your help! Deliver her 500x Money, and in gratitude, she will present you with a Megaphone to amplify your messages and spread your word!

questId8.name: Flare Star Butterflies
questId8.description: The graceful Flare Star Butterflies require your assistance! Deliver 1x Life Entwined, and in return, receive 100x Mystery Boxes filled with delightful surprises!

questId9.name: Youhu
questId9.description: Youhu, seeks your help! She is looking to host an unforgettable celebration! She is preparing a grand festival and needs 5000x Money, 50x Mystery Boxes, and 2x Megaphones to make it truly spectacular. In return, she'll bestow upon you the prestigious Crown Title, a mark of honor that elevates your status among adventurers!

questId10.name: Sunroom Siesta
questId10.description: Sunroom Siesta is curious about the role of moderators! Share your insights on their responsibilities, and she will reward you with a generous 💰 50000x Money to support your journey.
questId10.questions: What is the job of a moderator?
questId10.answers: Moderators assist the Developer in managing the bot and oversee all Customer Support matters. They enforce the rules and punish those who breach them. Moderators are here to help with issues, answer questions, and ensure that users have a smooth experience. Do not disturb them with unnecessary or unrelated matters.

questId11.name: Flare Star Butterflies
questId11.description: The enchanting Flare Star Butterflies flutter through the sky, their wings shining with mystic light. These mystical creatures seek your aid to retrieve the rare and breathtaking 🦋 Life Entwined. In gratitude for your generosity, they will reward you with 🎁 60x Super Mystery Boxes, each filled with cosmic wonders just waiting to be discovered!

questId12.name: Youhu
questId12.description: Youhu is brimming with untapped potential and treasures! She needs your assistance to gather 20x Mystery Boxes and 10x Super Mystery Boxes, sharing her abundant wealth with you in return. For your efforts, she will reward you with a generous 💵 20,000 Money and 📦 500 Bucks to enhance your adventures!

questId13.name: Youhu
questId13.description: A voluble and whimsical antique appraiser. Known for creating limericks on the spot, she presents her appraisals with flair and precision. She sets up a stall on the street, ensuring antiques find their way to those who truly cherish them. She seeks your wisdom about her origins. Can you answer this question and unlock the secrets of her story? Answer correctly, and she will grant you reward: 💵 50,000x Money, 💎 500x Blue Gem Coins, and 🌙 1x Moonlight!
questId13.questions: Who is Japanese Voice Actres of Youhu?

questId14.name: Stellar Symphony
questId14.description: Join the celestial gathering of the Stellar Symphony! They need your help to deliver 1x Crown Title, a symbol of prestige and honor. In return for your valuable contribution, you will receive a rich bounty: 50x 🪙 Coins, 50x 💰 Gold Coins, 10x 💎 Blue Gem Coins, 50x 📦 Bucks, 50x 🎁 Mystery Boxes, and 10📢 Megaphones to amplify your legacy!

questId15.name: Flare Star Butterflies
questId15.description: The Flare Star Butterflies are not just creatures of beauty—they hold ancient knowledge. They wish to know if you can identify the voice behind the mysterious Shorekeeper, a guardian of the Blackshores. Answer them correctly, and you will be granted immense rewards: 💵 20,000 Money, a majestic 👑 Crown Title, and the elusive 🦋 Life Entwined to weave into the fabric of your fate.
questId15.questions: Who is Japanese Voice Actres of Shorekeeper?
